text: Reidar Andreas Lyseth (14 July 1904 - 1 March 1987) was a Norwegian politician for the Labour Party. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from the Market towns of Sør-Trøndelag and Nord-Trøndelag in 1950, and was re-elected on one occasion. He had previously served in the position of deputy representative during the term 1945-1949\. Lyseth was born in Trondheim and was a member of Trondheim city council in 1931-1934, and a member of its executive committee in the periods 1945-1947, 1947-1951 and 1951-1954\. ==References== * Category:1904 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Labour Party (Norway) politicians Category:People from Trondheim Category:Members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Reidar Andreas Lyseth
